nodes.text: Keen's Grotto was the location of a notorious catacomb complex on Corellia. A team of four spelunkers became trapped there, necessitating rescue by a Corellian search and rescue squad, who deployed a GV/3-series guardian droid to save them. This incident became widely publicized, leading Cybot Galactica to produce a modified version of the guardian droid with enhanced detection sensors, emergency transponder, spotlight, and a packet of weather-proof survival guear.

Keen's Grotto is a real location in Indiana, where The New Essential Guide to Droids author Daniel Wallace once went spelunking with several college roommates, an experience he would later recall as being "unrelentingly miserable."
